data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Red Sea words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Red Sea, Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Red Sea, Sudan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 258 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Red Sea, Sudan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Red Sea, Sudan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Beja, Bisharin people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Red Sea hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, move the 5,403 believers in the state of Red Sea to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary:
the state of Red Sea, Sudan has a population of 1,396,000.

We estimate Red Sea has 5,403 people who might know Jesus, 64,190 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,326,407 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,326,407 who are far from you in Red Sea, Sudan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
